section.name: Maven Plugin
section.p: The Apache Tomcat Maven Plugin provides goals to manipulate WAR projects within the Apache Tomcat servlet container. You can run your War Apache Maven project through Apache Maven without deploying your WAR file to an Apache Tomcat instance.
More details are available in the Maven generated site:

subsection.name: Sources
subsection.p: Sources are located in the following svn path: http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/tomcat/maven-plugin/trunk/

subsection.name: Bug Tracker
subsection.p: The Bug Tracker to use is the ASF Jira instance: https://bz.apache.org/jira/browse/MTOMCAT
